title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, February 7, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of Sinclair Lewis (1885), whose novel “Main Street” satirizing people in the Midwest caused a sensation. It made him a millionaire in 1920.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
